entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Assiniboia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
